extensionDescription.message: A high-level live view of your bookmarks.

preferences.description: Label on button to open preferences.

menuItemOpenAllInTabs.description: Title of context menu item that opens all of a folder's bookmarks in new tabs.

menuItemDelete.description: Title of context menu item that deletes a bookmark.

menuItemProperties.description: Title of context menu item to edit bookmark properties.

dialogButtonCancel.description: Label on button to cancel a dialog.

dialogButtonDelete.description: Label on button to perform a delete action.

dialogButtonSave.description: Label on button to perform a save action.

dialogHeadingDeleteFolder.description: Title of dialog to confirm deleting a folder.

dialogHeadingBookmarkProperties.description: Title of dialog to edit bookmark properties.

dialogMessageDeleteFolder.message: Are you sure you want to delete this folder and all its bookmarks?
dialogMessageDeleteFolder.description: Message on dialog to confirm deleting a folder.

optionHeadingGeneral.description: Title of group for general options.

optionHeadingBookmarks.description: Title of group for bookmark options.

optionHeadingAppearance.description: Title of group for appearance options.

optionShowBookmarksToolbar.description: Title of option to show the Bookmarks Toolbar folder.

optionShowBookmarksMenu.description: Title of option to show the Bookmarks Menu folder.

optionShowOtherBookmarks.description: Title of option to show the Other Bookmarks folder.

optionTruncateLongTitles.description: Title of option to truncate long bookmark titles.

optionDisplayTooltips.description: Title of option to display bookmark tooltips.

optionShowRecentlyVisited.message: Increase font size if recently visited
optionShowRecentlyVisited.description: Title of option to increase the font size of recently visited bookmarks.

optionColorScheme.description: Title of option to choose a color scheme.

optionColorSchemeSystem.description: Title of color scheme option to follow the system color scheme.

optionColorSchemeLight.description: Title of color scheme option to use a light color scheme.

optionColorSchemeDark.description: Title of color scheme option to use a dark color scheme.

folderNoTitle.description: Display text for folder that has no name.

emptyFolder.description: Display text for the contents of an empty folder.

errorRetrievingBookmark.description: Message shown when an error occurs when showing the properties dialog.

errorSavingBookmark.description: Message shown when an error occurs when saving a bookmark's properties.

errorLoadingPreferences.description: Message shown when an error occurs when loading the extension's preferences.

errorLoadingBookmarks.description: Message shown when an error occurs when loading bookmarks.

errorLoadingHistory.description: Message shown when an error occurs when loading history.

openSourceAttributions.description: Text for link to open source attributions.
